songs.title: Down & Dirty
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Jesy Nelson, Leigh-Anne Pinnock & All]
I'm tasty, delicious, I'm rough around the edges
My mind is obsessive, my flex is aggressive
Glad I didn't listen to my teachers
Teachers teach you not to be a dreamer
I don't mind offending, I ain't 'bout pretending
Them haters be hating, my fashion be trending
Now I'm a believer, check out the stamps on my Visa
We international divas, but I started out making your pizzas

[Pre-Chorus: Perrie Edwards]
Yeah, if we only got one night
Forget about the world outside
Put your hands up real high

[Chorus: Leigh-Anne Pinnock & Jade Thirlwall]
(F—ck that) Get down and dirty
Get down and dirty
I know you heard me
Get down and dirty
(Everybody get down)

[Verse 2: Jade Thirlwall]
I don't ask the mirror, I know I'm the fairest
I'm bringin' the fire, so call me Daenerys
They wanna know who I'm sneakin' into my place
They don't need to know, no-one's business how I play

[Pre-Chorus: Perrie Edwards & Leigh-Anne Pinnock]
Yeah, if we only got one night
Forget about the world outside
Put your hands up real high

[Chorus: Leigh-Anne Pinnock & Jade Thirlwall]
(F—ck that) Get down and dirty
Get down and dirty
I know you heard me
Get down and dirty
(Everybody get down)
Get down and dirty
I know you heard me
Ge-ge-get down and dirty
(Everybody get down)

[Bridge: All & Perrie Edwards]
Four bad [boom!] make way cause we approachin'
Plenty room in the Royce if you’re rollin'
If you wanna go fast, say "Yeah"
Put your hands in the air

[Chorus: Leigh-Anne Pinnock & Jade Thirlwall]
(F—ck that) Get down and dirty
Get down and dirty
I know you heard me
Get down and dirty
Get down and dirty
I know you heard me
Get down and dirty
(Everybody get down)
